programme.title: The Rise of Charity Witt
programme.desc: S1:E5 Dubbed The Worlds Strongest Barbie, Charity suffered a heart attack when she was only 17 years old, due to being overworked and poor life choices. This health crisis lead her to change her mindset by taking action on changing her life, that put her on a path that lead her to becoming an elite powerlifter, a Strongwoman competitor, a winner of the Titan Games and escaping an abusive relationship.

programme.title: The Rise Of Damien Rider
programme.desc: S1:E7 Damien Rider was beaten up, thrown against walls, and left all by himself as a child because of an abusive stepfather. After four attempts to end his own life, he decided he needed to deal with his demons by doing the most extreme thing he could do. Discover why Damien felt like he needed to paddle through a deadly ocean and why when he was just about to quit, the entire trajectory of his life would be permanently changed forever.

programme.title: The Rise of Rocky NoHands
programme.desc: S1:E4 How would you feel if you lost in Fortnite to one of the worlds best players, and found out he was using his mouth as a controller? RockyNoHands is a professional eSports Fortnite player, making a career of playing a video game he loves and being among the best in the world at it. After the darkest moment of Rocky’s life left him paralyzed and motionless in a hospital bed, doctors told him he may never walk again. It wasn’t until a source of pure motivation forced him to dig deep to find his unbreakable drive, that he was able to take on his biggest and most rewarding challenge yet.

programme.title: The Rise Of Fredia Gibbs
programme.desc: S1:E6 Fredia Gibbs was the first female African American kickboxing world champion who learned how to fight as a child because she grew up scared and afraid. It wasn’t until she unknowingly got into a van alone after a party with a man who turned out to be a serial killer, that all the years of fighting and training would help her unleash the power she had inside of her and catapult her to new heights.

programme.title: The Kardashians vs. Jordyn Woods
programme.desc: S1:E4 Jordyn Woods was somebody the Kardashian family trusted. But all that changed when rumours of her being a home wrecker emerged after a scandalous yet confusing night at a party with Khloé Kardashian’s then-boyfriend and NBA player, Tristan Thompson. Our team investigated both sides of the story and got the real truth about what happened that night.

programme.title: Winona Ryder vs. Johnny Depp
programme.desc: S1: E10 Johnny Depp’s trial with Amber Heard had everyone talking, but wait until you hear about Winona Ryder’s. Johnny experienced love at first sight and became obsessed with Winona. But after their breakup, Winona dealt with mental health issues and her own very public trial, which has some striking similarities with Johnny and Ambers. Everyone thought she was a crazy, and the aftermath of her court case left her banished from the world. Winona went through a great awakening outside of the public eye and bounced back into Hollywood.

programme.title: Jennifer Aniston vs. Brangelina
programme.desc: S1:E12 For almost 20 years, the media portrayed Jennifer Aniston as a heartbroken woman who would never be happy until she had kids. That couldn’t be further from the truth. Our team uncovered details that will prove Brad and Jennifer were the perfect Hollywood couple everybody adored, until Brad suddenly left Jen for Angelina Jolie. This story is so much bigger than Brangelina.

programme.title: Drake Bell vs. Josh Peck
programme.desc: S1:E15 Everyone loved Drake & Josh but people don’t know the dark story behind the world’s favorite kids’ show. Josh struggled with his weight and addiction while filming the show. It was always painful for him to be the chubby sidekick to the cool, popular Drake. Then Josh shocked the world when he revealed that he and Drake weren’t even really friends. Drake was furious, sparking a massive backlash against Josh. But no one knew just how dark of a path Drake had gone down.

programme.title: Britney Spears vs. Justin Timberlake
programme.desc: S1:E8 Did Britney Spears really cheat on Justin Timberlake? Britney and Justin were the perfect couple until she was accused of cheating on him after their breakup. Justin told the world his side of the story and the media believed him while Britney was mocked and silenced. The whole world watched as Britney went from being the media’s pop princess to spiralling in a very public meltdown, but what did Justin have to do with it? Our team uncovered the truth behind what really happened, and what Justin’s iconic Cry Me a River video has to do with Britney’s freedom.

programme.title: Surviving A Serial Killer
programme.desc: S1:E2 Lisa McVey did not want to live past 17 years old, and on the day she wrote her goodbye letter, was snatched in the street. For the next 26 hours, it was up to Lisa to outsmart her captor, later identified as serial killer Bobby Joe Long.

programme.title: Kailash Satyarthi: Man vs. Mafia
programme.desc: Nobel Peace Prize Winner Kailash Satyarthi has dedicated his life to ending child trafficking in India. Hes freed over 87,000 children from horrific slave-like conditions, but he couldnt save the one person who mattered most...Why does he continue to risk his life to end child labor?

programme.title: The Dark Side of Elon Musk
programme.desc: Elon Musk, founder of SpaceX and CEO of Tesla, always found it hard fitting in with others. Hiding his painful secrets - Elon threw himself into his work, amassing huge success as an entrepreneur. But when he got caught up in the middle of a messy divorce with Amber Heard, Elon’s worst fears were realized and he hit a severe breaking point.

programme.title: Linda Cliatt-Wayman: A Teacher Like No Other
programme.desc: Linda Cliatt-Wayman volunteered to be Principal of one of the most dangerous schools in America. On her first day, she quickly realized that the job was much more complex and frightening than she thought. But, she was determined to give her students hope, even when they were threatening her life.

programme.title: Terry Crews: My Biggest Regret
programme.desc: For years Terry Crews was terrified of his alcoholic father. Decades later, Terry finally confronts him about his childhood. But why does it become his biggest regret?

programme.title: Brian Bushway: Blind Sports
programme.desc: Record breaking mountain biker Brian Bushway became totally blind at the age of 14. He went from being an active teen outdoors to depression and uncertainty. He never thought he would be able to ride his bike again, until he developed a superpower that allowed him to see.

programme.title: Deontay Wilder - Box For Life
programme.desc: American heavyweight champion Deontay Wilder reveals the heartbreaking reason why he got into boxing and the one person who inspired him to never give up fighting to become the World Champion.

programme.title: Liz Murray - Resilience in the Streets
programme.desc: At the age of 15, Liz Murray was abandoned by her drug-addicted parents and living on the streets of New York City. Against all odds, she managed to finish high school and graduate from Harvard. How did she do it?

programme.title: Billy Monger: Unstoppable Teen
programme.desc: Billy Monger was on the track to becoming a child Formula 4 star. But days before his birthday, Billy suffered a horrendous crash that made headlines around the world and left him in critical condition. Can you imagine your own kid in the seat of a race car going up to 200 MPH?

programme.title: Alicia Kozakiewicz: Friend or Predator?
programme.desc: At just 13 years old, Alicia Kozakiewicz stepped outside her family home and into every parent’s worst nightmare. She’d agreed to meet the “friend” with whom she’d been chatting online for six months, but by the time she realized this man was a deranged predator, it was too late. How did she manage to stay alive? And what traumatic lesson does Alicia want all parents and teens to hear?

programme.title: Misdiagnosed - Every Mother's Worst Nightmare
programme.desc: Victoria felt a pain in her abdomen. Doctor’s said she was faking it and then the unthinkable happened. She began to deteriorate and ended up completely paralyzed. She was a prisoner in her own body, trapped inside capable of hearing everything but incapable of responding. Doctors gave up but her mother never lost hope. That hope kept her alive and her story has captured the nation’s attention.

programme.title: From Thief to Self-Made Millionaire
programme.desc: Watch John Assarafs personal story of growth, the lessons he learned early on in life, and how he went from robber to self-made millionaire by brushing his teeth.

programme.title: Steps to Financial Success: Grow Your Wealth at Any Age
programme.desc: Do you know what the most important steps are that you can take today to grow your wealth? Regardless of your age or where you are in life with saving for retirement, todays show is for you. Joe Anderson, CFP, and Big Al Clopine, CPA give you the steps to success to grow your wealth at any age!

programme.title: Retirement Sabotage! 12 Post-Retirement Money Mistakes to Avoid
programme.desc: "Inflation, required minimum distributions, asset allocation, stock market declines, Social Security and Medicare, long-term care, and estate planning are important considerations when it comes to retirement planning, and its all too easy to make mistakes. After 40-plus years of saving for retirement, the last thing you want to do is sabotage all your hard work once you retire! Learn from Joe Anderson, CFP and Big Al Clopine, CPA key tips and tricks to avoid 12 big money mistakes that can sabotage your post-retirement plans."

programme.title: Here's the #1 Trap That Will Ruin Your Retirement
programme.desc: Retirement is often seen as a golden period in ones life, filled with opportunities for leisure, family time, personal growth, and giving back to the community. However, there is a common trap that many retirees fall into that jeopardizes the quality of their golden years.

programme.title: Why Living Off Portfolio Interest No Longer Works in 2024
programme.desc: Living off the interest generated by your portfolio may not be as safe as you think With interest rates on the rise, its tempting to park your money in a high-yield savings account or bond. The problem is, inflation will erode your purchasing power over time, leaving you without enough money to get by down the line.

programme.title: 25 Ways You Could Be OVERPAYING For Medicare Services In 2024!
programme.desc: Are you ready to SAVE Money on Medicare in 2024? Join Marvin Musick from Medicare School as he shares 25 valuable tips to help retirees on fixed incomes and tight budgets! Marvin covers topics ranging from choosing the right Medicare Plan, Supplemental Plans down to prescription drug plans, preferred pharmacies, and even how to utilize telehealth services and how to understand income-related monthly adjusted amounts (IRMAA).

programme.title: 5 Strategies to Maximize Your Social Security Benefits
programme.desc: Maximizing your Social Security benefits requires careful planning and a solid understanding of the system.

programme.title: How to Retire ASAP - and Where to Save to Get There
programme.desc: "Ricochet J in CO and her husband want to retire as soon as humanly possible. Are they on track? Should they save their surplus funds to a brokerage account or a solo 401(k)? That s today on Your Money, Your Wealth podcast 505 with Joe Anderson, CFP® and Big Al Clopine, CPA. Plus, Micah in SD wonders whether having a $40,000 a year pension is basically the same as having a million dollars in bonds, according to the four percent rule. What do Joe and Big Al think? Barney & Betty will be in the 12 or 22 marginal tax bracket, but their effective tax rate will only be between 10 and 12.4, so how much should they convert to Roth? Are they asking the right question? And finally, Joe and Big Al spitball on ways to ensure that Amir in NM has the maximum possible retirement income to last him to age 90 or 95."

programme.title: Retirement Blind Spots: Avoid Sabotaging Your Financial Plan
programme.desc: On your road to retirement have you stayed too focused on just socking money away without considering blind spots that could sabotage your overall financial plan? From unexpected out-of-pocket expenses to untimely market downturns, you can lower the impact of these events by planning for them. Financial professionals Joe Anderson and Alan Clopine highlight the biggest blind spots and help you put a plan in place that can help safeguard your retirement plans.

programme.title: How to Maximize Retirement Income | Implement and Do Better Than the 4 Rule
programme.desc: Planning for a comfortable retirement requires careful consideration of various factors, and one commonly discussed approach is the 4 rule. Its essential to understand the nuances of the 4 rule and explore additional strategies to make the most out of your retirement savings.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

Paradise Waits
programme.desc: Sony Mind's Eye is a series of self-edits by Teton Gravity Research athletes. Episode 3 features footage captured while filming for Paradise Waits, TGR's 2015 snowsports film.

programme.title: White Wedding
programme.desc: In Jackson Hole, Wyoming, the relentless winter of 2017 was one for the record books. Relive this epic 600 inch season in Storm Show’s newest ski/ride/adrenaline film White Wedding. Highlights include: neck deep powder, massive airs & probable first descents, the show-stopping snowpocalypse event, and a 40 mile expedition into the heart of the Wind River Range.

programme.title: Sea Kayaking the Caves of the Magdalen Islands
programme.desc: A breathtaking chain of islands located far from anywhere else in the Gulf of the St. Lawrence, les Îles de la Madeleine are unlike anything you've ever seen. Join host, Ken Whiting, as he sea kayaks and swims along the stunning coastline, explores amazing sea caves and discovers the unique pleasures of island living.

programme.title: Wadi Rum
programme.desc: Set in the expansive landscape of Jordan’s distinctive national park, “Wadi Rum” documents the unlikely story of two Israeli climbers, an affable Bedouin Muslim, and a professional American climber as they work together to complete a climbing route up Wadi Rums’ largest rock formation. Three years ago, Israeli climbers Eliav (Eli) Nissan and Elad Omer began working on the ‘Sultan El-Mujahidin,’ in an effort to re-introduce this area back into the modern climbing community.

programme.title: Global Convoy
programme.desc: A bunch of penniless goons are determined to see the world and meet all the wondrous peoples it contains. They buy cars for £150 and totally clueless, set off across Europe, Central Asia, Siberia and then over to the USA and south to Argentina. Years from now, when academics intone about the DIY backlash to a modern society drowning in tech, then this film will be cited.

programme.title: The Mentor
programme.desc: Professional climber Marcus Garcia travels from his home in southwest Colorado’s San Juan Mountains to the limestone cliffs and spires of El Potrero Chico in northern Mexico to revisit his mentor’s final climb. In an emotional and powerful act of closure, he reflects on the accident that took him a decade to talk about—and climbs the route that took his mentor’s life.

programme.title: Micah Creek HD
programme.desc: Follow the Teton Gravity crew as they search for lines in Micah Creek, BC. After being trapped in the lodge for six days, they get a chance to take out the heli and hit some deep powder lines.

programme.title: FIA Motorsport Games
programme.desc: The 2024 FIA Motorsport Games in Valencia, Spain, featured a diverse array of 26 disciplines across various motorsport categories.

programme.title: Michelin 12H Mugello
programme.desc: The Michelin 12H Mugello is a 12-hour endurance race held at Italy's Autodromo Internazionale del Mugello.

programme.title: LIVE: MotoAmerica Parts Unlimited Talent Cup By Motul

programme.title: Garden Party
programme.desc: Ready to dig in and grow your green thumb? Join us for a delightful hour of expert-led gardening tutorials designed to inspire and educate gardeners of all levels. From essential planting tips and soil secrets to creative container gardening and vibrant floral arrangements, our seasoned instructors will guide you through every step. Whether you're a seasoned horticulturist or just starting out, you'll find fresh ideas and practical techniques to cultivate the garden of your dreams.

programme.title: Let's Play a Game
programme.desc: Whether indoors or out, games are fun! Bowl at home with family and friends with a colorful bowling set Katie makes from recycled water bottles. Franz shows how to create your own game board using a variety of art mediums. Jenny and Katie make an indoor hopscotch court that rolls-up, for easy storage. Braid a ring toss toy then use the Family Craft box to make a treasure hunt jar for quiet fun.

programme.title: Fin, Feathers and Fur
programme.desc: Let's get creative with inspiration from the forest, sea and sky. Jenny Barnett-Rohrs and Katie Hacker make a friendly hedgehog then Katie creates a wiggly fish. Franz Spohn scratches off paint to make colorful animal images and Jenny makes a gelatin print Valentine's Day card.

programme.title: A Scrappy Stash-Buster Quilt Pattern

programme.title: Touring with Writer Phillip Lopate

programme.title: Summer in the Country

programme.desc: Tom and Jerry are police officers, driving around in their car and enjoying listening to some music on their police radio, when they hear a bulletin announcing another theft of a mummy from the local museum. They stumble upon the culprit, a mysterious and ghoulish man who is carrying a coffin through a secret door in a cemetery. They sneak in after him and watch him command the mummy to life; it is a beautiful woman, who he then commands to sing for his audience of skeletal theatre-goers. Tom and Jerry break up the evening and try to escape with the stolen goods, with mixed results.

programme.title: MUSE, THE
programme.desc: Rock star Addison Taylor is three years removed from the fame and fortune of being a one hit wonder and his life is spiraling into a self center paranoid depression - He needs another hit and fast. His manager suggests a couple weeks away at a secluded recently purchased lake-house as a way to get the creative juices flowing. The change in scenery sparks immediate inspiration, but also a strange and potentially deadly change in Addison. A mysterious force in the form of a beautiful woman and an odd, eerily marked guitar helps him to create his best work but also appears to want something in return. Things turn deadly when friends intervene in an attempt to bring Addison back to reality - will he pull free of the Muses clutches or will Addison fall prey to her powers and stay forever?

programme.title: NEXUS
programme.desc: Holly is a struggling jazz singer whose life is torn apart when she loses custody of her daughter. On her first visitation, she discovers that her soon to be ex-husband is missing. When Holly is accused of her husbands murder she finds herself at the center of a small town conspiracy and must harness all her inner strength to save her daughter and clear her name.

programme.title: Tooth Trouble
programme.desc: Zips got a bad toothache and is too afraid to go to the dentist. The Super Six decide to help by showing her how easy it is; however, their new dentist looks an awful lot like Sneevil who uses laughing gas to make the Smighties powerless. Zip has to face the dentist to rescue her friends.

programme.title: Swimming Class
programme.desc: Dunky wants to learn swimming so goes to the lake with a tyre tube with Keet who is helping looking at the swimming manual to tell him how to swim.

programme.title: Shopping Mad
programme.desc: Its shopping time! Don and Colonel move the trolley up the aisles, little do they know that the three mice are peeping from between Don’s bag. Chaos unfolds in the mall!

programme.title: HOT SEAT
programme.desc: Chai Raja finishes his super stylish chai making. Now he wants to relax for a while.So he takes out his favourite wooden chair to rest in between his cooking. But the chair has a minor problem. Its right hand is a little shaky due to a loose nut. Chai Raja instructs Sundar to fix it. Sundar happily and proudly takes it outside the shop to repair. Basha is super excited to get something to play with. It is war time for Sundar trying to save his masters favourite chair. But Basha is coming up with innovative plans to destroy the chair. In between when Chai Raja wants to sit, Sundar goes crazy finding things for his master to sit - a stack of pillows, a wooden log, over even his own back! At last all that remains of the chair is a few pieces of wooden sticks. And an exasperated Sundar gives the sticks to Chai Raja and asks him to beat him upbecause Sundar knows that it is coming anyways!

programme.title: Python Problem
programme.desc: Don is trimming the hedge and humming to himself and guess what slithers out from between the bush. A python. And this is no ordinary python, he can beat up Colonel, drive a truck with its tail, stay alive in the fridge and lots more.

programme.title: Prickly Pair
programme.desc: Nino is having a tough time trying to put his daisies up as desired to win the Wonderful Window Box competition that Mayor De Pfeffle is hosting. Deedee cheers him up by saying that flowers can be placed anywhere as long as it makes Abra-Dabra more beautiful. Just then Mewmew runs in all flustered and panicky. The problem seems to be that the creeper plant at Mewmew’s window hasn’t grown big enough to creep all around the heart-shaped support. But Deedee can’t help with magic, as it would be unfair in the competition against everyone else. Charlie loves his display but is being overprotective by shooing the twins away to play ball elsewhere. The twins accidentally throw the ball directly at Uncle Charlie’s display, knocking them all down and breaking them in the process. But there’s no time to fix them up without magic. Deedee brews a magic potion with a few ingredients. The magic potion makes all of Charlie’s flowers into cacti, something Charlie dislikes the most. Since Deedee feels she’s let Charlie down, they all decide to take theor very own flowers to replace Charlie’s exhibit. But with a sudden spelt of rain, all are damaged by the time they reach Charlie’s. But the rain has also caused the cacti to bloom, a rare sight indeed. Mayor De Pfeffle awards Uncle Charlie with the honour of being winner of the Wonderful Window Boz contest. But Charlie wants to share the award with all his friends

programme.title: The Garden Guardians
programme.desc: The Wise Elders ask the Guardians to take care of their vegetable garden while they go on a trip. Xia and April think it’s the dullest job ever, but Pai is over the moon. Negu seizes the chance to send his Mutant Beetles, who try to wreck the garden, making Pai’s life impossible. He has to use a secret known only to the most green-fingered gardeners to beat the Mutants and save the garden.

programme.title: Love Me Not
programme.desc: Don is sitting in the bathtub, smiling. He slips down further and gets comfy as he lies in the tub.He turns over and pulls the cushion around his neck closer. Only, it’s not a cushion. It’s an OCTOPUS!And its in love with Colonel!

programme.title: HYPNO-TACO
programme.desc: A new taco stand that has abruptly popped up overnight next to the tea shop. Strangely, though the tacos smell anything but tasty, the customers flock to it and Chai Raja sends Sundar to deal with matters. But that compounds the disaster as Sundar too turns his back at Chai Raja and starts guarding/waiting at the Taco stand with double his usual smartness! Though this gives Basha full freedom to raid the banana fries at the tea shop, Chai Rajas long face tugs at this heartstrings and Basha nips over to the taco stand to take a look at things. Thats when he realizes that the taco stand owner is in fact a rogue hypnotist from Bashas old circus who is literally hypnotizing the customers and Sundar to munch his Mexican lunch! Cracking his knuckles in glee, Basha sets about driving the rogue out of his mind and business. But a hypnotized Sunder is more powerful than ever, and Basha get whacked here and there in the ordeal. At last Basha gives a nice knock on Sundars head and he is back at the tea shop and Basha and Sundar together makes sure that the taco shop-owner runs for his dear life, much to Chai Rajas relief.

programme.title: Star to Star
programme.desc: Hey kids! Emmie our cute little elephant loves dancing & sings good english songs. Its time to enjoy the pirate song & more with Emmie! Sway and listen to great kids song like Pirate song , Rain, Catch a wave and hula hoop! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats!

programme.title: GOOD CROC, BAD CROC!
programme.desc: The Guardians enjoy a baby croc until it grows into an unmanageable mutant sent by Negu. They’ll need to train the croc, and then return it to the island Negu stole it from.

programme.title: NewPointofView
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Smighty Frighty
programme.desc: In this Halloween-themed story, Sneevil and Biggs get the scare of the lifetime when the Spooky Smighties decide to teach them a lesson in the middle of Fright Forest.

programme.title: Friends or Foes
programme.desc: Its friendship day and Dunky makes both Keet and Cat share friendship bands with each other and makes them promise to maintain friendship for a day at least.

programme.title: Train Ride
programme.desc: Don and Colonel is in for a calm and peaceful train journey. And then the hilarious pests enter the scene. The trio is having a time of their life; but at the cost of Don and Colonel. Their train journey is a colossal disaster. But, would the rats get away with it?? He he hell no!

programme.title: Marco's Garden
programme.desc: The neighboring dog Moti is very fussy about his Garden of the house and takes his job seriously to guard it.

programme.title: Sleepy Colonel
programme.desc: It is a sleep deprived Colonel and a caring bro Don who would do anything to make his big bro sleep. And there is Larry, Marly and Charly who scream the life out of Colonel. It is a war for a little calm slumber. And the brothers realize that, with the rats around, it is an impossible thing to get.

programme.title: Whirlwind
programme.desc: Deedee is sadly whirling the magic wand wondering what to do. But no matter what Nino suggests, Deedee wants to have the magical version of it all, be it baking a cake or even walking. Finally they decide on the giant jumble jigsaw. Inspite of Nino’s efforts to have a non-magic activity, Deedee’s magic seems to be only solution to tackling the over-sized pieces. But the spell literally whips up a storm. Deedee struggles to control the whirlwind, but it whizzes past out of control into the field ahead. The jigsaw pieces fall in place perfectly but the whirlwind hasn’t stopped. The whirlwind becomes so naughty that it snatches Deedee’s magic wand away. The whirlwind wildly knocks down everything in its path and throws out all the things inside Tiggy’s house. Not to mention the letters of postman Charlie. Even though all are shaken up pretty much by the naughty whirlwind, Deedee is encouraged by all her friends to catch it. The whirlwind even plays mischief with the Tika Pila monster and also the Mayor! The Mayor falls with a bump out of the whirlwind, but luckily with Deedee’s wand. They decide to wear-out the whirlwind safely without magic. They come up with a plan and together do their thing. The whirlwind gradually gets tired and so does the magic wear off. Although it messed up the town, all of them have quite a laugh.

programme.title: THAT SINKING FEELING
programme.desc: Mei decides to impress Negu with an art museum. He has the Rock-Eating Mutant pull down old buildings to build the museum. The Guardians’ “island” starts to sink. Pai “fishes” for the cause of the sinking and pulls up the Mutant, whom they entice to eat something besides rocks.

programme.title: The Race
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Too Cute
programme.desc: Biggs transforms himself into a cute baby animal to blend into Leilas Zoo. Now disguised, he can easily help Sneevil steal the Earth Stone. But all the sweet attention from Leila makes Biggs question his loyalty.

programme.title: CHAI-CE CREAM
programme.desc: It is a hot summer day and the customers are sweating. Chai Raja and Sundar are trying hard to keep them cool. To make matters worse a group of school students come with their class teacher as a part of their picnic. And the same time an ice-cream seller comes in front of the shop. Delighted, all the customers and the students flock around him to buy ice-cream. Chai Raja and Sundar are instantly out of customers and business. Totally frustrated, Chai Raja appoints Sundar to canvas the customers back to the hotel. Sundar tries to do some stupid performances to lure the kids back. But things take a twist when Basha teams up with the ice-cream seller. Now it is full on competition. And lets see who wins!

programme.title: Office Fiasco
programme.desc: Don gets a new office job and he is so excited to begin. Are the rats equally excited?? well they are – but for something else. With their pranks and tricks, Larry Marly and Charly make sure that Don doesnt reach his office. But, when he somehow reaches the office, they make sure that the boss throws him out finally.

programme.title: KALAI-TEA-TEA
programme.desc: Chai Raja is organizing a Kathakali performance in front of his teashop for a group of special guests in the evening. The Kathakali dancer is in the shop enjoying tea and snacks. In the crazy fight between Sundar and Basha, the dancers both legs gets bandaged and he runs away from the shop. Chai Raja catches Sundar in the act! Chai Raja is so angry and panicking. He decides that Sundar is going to dance Kathakali! Next we see a poor Sundar all dressed up in the Kathakali costume with his snout sticking out. The performance starts and Sundar doesnt know what to do. The naughty Basha still has no plans to leave poor Sundaralone. He tries to trips, tickle, push and irritate Sundar from the rafter of the stage. Sundar is running all over the stage musch to Bashas delight and Chai Rajas horror. But the special guests love Sundars performance and awards him with a trophy! Basha is stunnedand Sundar is thrilled beyond words!

programme.title: The Organizer
programme.desc: Gummy and Harry team up to become “super-organized’ – and their non-stop efficiency winds up being more than a little ‘too much of a good thing”.

programme.title: Atchoo!
programme.desc: The Guardians meet a very cute mutant with a terrible cold. They decide to adopt it and name it Atchoo. When the Guardians see that the gates of the Magic Fort standing open, they think Atchoo has betrayed them. But in fact, Atchoo has been captured by Amkko and Koto, who wanted to get Negu’s defective mutant back again. The Guardians free their friend and discover that the only ones at the Magic Fort were the Wise Elders, doing a spot of cleaning.

programme.title: THE PAI WHO CRIED WOLF
programme.desc: To discover his powers as the Rodent Warrior, Pai goes on a solo night quest. But he keeps seeing the Wolf Warrior (Koto and Amkko in a disguise made by Mei). He runs to tell April and Xia, who don’t believe him. He battles the Wolf Warrior, discovering his Rodent Warrior powers (Super-Burrowing and Super-Cheeks) as he reveals Koto and Amkko inside the disguise.

programme.title: Day At The Spa
programme.desc: Don and Colonel want to pamper themselves. Yes!! a complete spa treatment. And when Larry Marly and Charly enter the scene, spa becomes a punishment for Don and Colonel. But when they are at their wits end, the dogs make sure that, the naughty rats learn a lesson. How does the twist happen??

programme.title: The Secrets of the Engine
programme.desc: The kids use the Mach 6 time machine to travel back in time to change their bleak future. They see the origins of the time travel car, their parents, and the rise of the Shadowy Organization.

programme.title: Playmates
programme.desc: A peaceful day. Don is watering his plants and suddenly the water stops. He jerks the hose, pokes a stick into it, but doesn’t realize that it’s the mice who are causing this water explosion! Don has to take revenge, and this time he sits on his couch with a bunch of fire crackers! Will he set the house on fire?

programme.title: Scary Face
programme.desc: Pancake over-teases Maple with his new “scary face,” then gets a taste of his own medicine in the Zooniverse when, as the old saying goes, his face freezes that way. Just because you think something is fun or funny doesn’t mean everybody else is having the same good time you are.

programme.title: Ice Cream Stick
programme.desc: Ice cream arent just fun for eating, Hepi and Briko come up with some sizzling ideas

programme.title: The North Wind and the Sun
programme.desc: The North Wind and the Sun collide over whos stronger. They set a bet, to see who can make the passing traveler take off his jacket first.

programme.title: SCHOOL’S OUT!
programme.desc: When the Elders sail off to play Bingo, Pai and Xia say it’s party time! They get April to dance, but she loses her fan, which falls down to the Chou World. Amkko and Koto use it to fly up to the Yan World on the giant mutant chicken. While April distracts the mutants with tango lessons, Xia and Pai send the chicken packing.

programme.title: I'm fine!
programme.desc: The twins encounter in the woods an owl who can’t see very well, but won’t admit it. Until the twins give him a strange pair of glasses.

programme.title: The Lightning Strikes
programme.desc: Its raining heavily and the three are nicely tucked in the sofa and watching a tv show as the tv goes out.

programme.title: Royal rift
programme.desc: Ragoo brings the twins a banjo and they find themselves in a fantasy castle where a King and a Queen keep fighting about everything. The Twins will play a song that will bring peace in this land.

programme.title: Ant Attack!
programme.desc: It is a usual day in the house with the war between the dogs and the rats. And there is a new group. In fact an army of enemies – ants! And they make the life in the house a living hell. For the first time Don , Colonel and the rat trio get a real taste of the bad ants.

programme.title: Too Many Bubbles
programme.desc: When Pancake eats too many bubbles from the Bubble Pond, he becomes super bouncy. Too much of anything isnt good.

programme.title: The Heroes’ Path
programme.desc: Xia is bored because it’s been days since Negu sent a Mutant when he finds the instructions for the “Heroes’ Path”. Pai and April laugh at what they think is a silly game for kids, but Xia completes each step with great excitement. When one of the instructions is to steal the Glove of the North, Xia begins to suspect something. Thanks to his quick wits he manages to save the Glove of the North and find out who was behind the “Heroes’ Path” – a mutant fox, sent by Negu.

programme.title: KING SCUMWORM
programme.desc: Peng’s carelessness leads to the Ninjas fighting their way out of the nest of a huge (but dopey) parasitic monarch.

programme.title: PAI THE PIRATE
programme.desc: When the Guardians stumble across a treasure map, Pai happily starts playing pirate, eager to find the treasure. But the Elders warn them about the dangers of treasure, and take the map. Negu sends mutant pirates to attack the Guardians! About to walk the plank, the Guardians convince the pirates to go look for the treasure. While the pirates are distracted by the treasure, the Guardians escape to the Lord of the Wind, from which they defeat the pirates. The treasure proves to be nothing more than a bean. Pai tosses it over his shoulder, unaware that it grows into a giant stalk!

programme.title: Cat and Keet Went up Hill
programme.desc: GrandPA has taken the trio for a small holiday in the high hills. Its very cold and surrounded by snow. t

programme.title: Electric Chase
programme.desc: They are so fed up of the rats that colonel comes up with an idea to tame them – an electronic super cat! And it works! The rats are terrified of it. Now it is the rule of the dogs. Until..until the idea backfires. Watch it for a hilarious time.

programme.title: A Fog of A Different Color
programme.desc: When the Foggy messes with the Zoonicorns colors, Maple learns that the appearance of a thing does not define what it is. It’s not what’s on the outside that makes a thing/person what it is, but what’s on the inside

programme.title: Everyone's good at something
programme.desc: The twins meet a little Snowgirl who lacks self-esteem but they help her discover a hidden skill which makes her the hit of the ‘North Pole’s Got Talent’ competition.

programme.title: Heungboo and Nolboo
programme.desc: Mischievous UGo takes all of his parents property and kicks his younger brother GoGo out of the house. Meanwhile, a swallow bird brings a gourd seed to the eaves of a kind-hearted GoGo house, and soon, gourds containing gold and silver treasures opens on the roof of the GoGos house.

programme.title: Gummy’s Sick Day
programme.desc: Gummy is feeling under the weather – and, as a finicky, fussbudget patient, soon winds up driving his pals Kala and Harry both sick... of him!

programme.title: PAI THE WIZARD
programme.desc: Discouraged with cleaning Maestro Meow’s humble hut, Pai uses the Elder’s conch horn (which Pai thinks is magic) to summon what he thinks are “Cleaner Birds.” But they prove to be Party Birds, and soon have overrun the Westerly Breeze!

programme.title: Non Stop Dance Party
programme.desc: Melody creates a tune so catchy that she puts all the Smighties into a trance. Its up to her to now save the day and stop the villains with her powerful music.

programme.title: The Washed - Away Planet
programme.desc: Aladdin is entrusted to deliver a very precious necklace. When Jamillah arrives she knocks into him and out of worry for the necklace he opens the box but then it accidentally drops down a drain! He knows how expensive that necklace is, it would take him 20 years to earn enough to pay for it so he resigns himself to trying to find a job so that he can start earning the money back. Meanwhile Jamillah calls on Genie to help him get the necklace back and after some sifting around he finds it in the drain and Aladdin is able to deliver it on time.

programme.title: The Old Car
programme.desc: GrandPA wants to go out of town to visit his son, But the whole car has just collapsed and fallen apart . So tells Dunky to service his car and get it ready for him by the evening as he is resting in his room.

programme.title: The Green Monkey - The Thousand And One Nights
programme.desc: The fairytale detective SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the exotic world of The Thousand and One Nights, having been called out by the VIZIER of Baghdad. His daughter, SCHEHERAZADE has mysteriously lost her voice, when there is just one more night to go to reach the magic number 1001. If SANDRA and FO don’t manage to solve the case and remedy the problem, SCHEHERAZADE will not be able to tell the last story to the SULTAN and will be executed the next morning

programme.title: Brother Ogre – Puss In Boots Case 2
programme.desc: SANDRA and FO travel into the story of PUSS IN BOOTS, having been called out by his fiancée, a very refined cat who is the pet of the PRINCESS in the story. The wedding between the MARQUIS OF CARABAS and the PRINCESS is very close, but the MARQUIS and his CAT have disappeared. SANDRA and FO go to the OGRE’s castle in which the quick-witted cat and his master now live, and discover that a second OGRE, the brother of the first one, who PUSS IN BOOTS ate after convincing him to turn himself into a mouse, has imprisoned inside the castle.

programme.title: PET PEEVES
programme.desc: April tries for Xia’s attention, but he’s too busy doting on his new pet bird, Peachy Woo. Pai loves his new pet fish, Noodle. April suspects Peachy Woo of being the mutant the Elders have warned the Guardians about, but it turns out to be…Noodle!

programme.title: You Don’t Say
programme.desc: PANCAKE and ODESSA’S friendship is strained when the young otter unknowingly offends Odessa. In the Zooniverse, Pancake learns a lesson when he and the Zoonicorns picnic in Echo Canyon where hurtful words which turn into irritating little creatures, Words can hurt.

programme.title: Hot Water
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: The Lightning Strikes
programme.desc: Its raining heavily and the three are nicely tucked in the sofa and watching a tv show as the tv goes out.

programme.title: Road Trip Snag
programme.desc: Don and Colonel is on a journey in their house on wheels. But hey! With the rats around, will they ever have a peaceful anything??? It is indeed a fun for the trio, but not for poor Don and Colonel. The house on wheels turns into a madhouse on wheels!

programme.title: Books And Roses
programme.desc: Braianna’s Fake Robot Parents go on love overdrive, hoarding every book and rose in town, just as they are in demand for the romantic holiday.

programme.title: Surprise Day Off
programme.desc: When all the teachers at school are mysteriously absent one day, Fred initially cheerleads his classmates to celebrate. Brains figures out they have been taken away by the potato-brained Potatoids, and she and Fred go off to rescue them.

programme.title: Lunch Munch
programme.desc: GrandPA has some special guests visiting and Dunky has to make a lavish lunch.

programme.title: Music Mayhem
programme.desc: Whoever heard of Ipods short circuiting? To add to that rigged head phones, musical bombs and bombastic explosions that takes them to outer space. The brother duo gets mummified ultimately but still there is no end to this musical mayhem.

programme.title: Hamster in the House.
programme.desc: Friendly and lovable ‘mad scientist’ Granny Peters accidentally transforms her cute little pet hamster.... into a not-so-cute HUGE pet hamster – and things get interesting when it escapes and decides to move into Gummy’s place uninvited.

programme.title: A Fog of A Different Color
programme.desc: When the Foggy messes with the Zoonicorns colors, Maple learns that the appearance of a thing does not define what it is. It’s not what’s on the outside that makes a thing/person what it is, but what’s on the inside

programme.title: Smorigins
programme.desc: The Super Six go back in time to find out the origins of the Smighty Stones. The Villains tag along, too and find themselves in the middle of a prehistoric dragon battle.

programme.title: Super Fireworks Show
programme.desc: Nardy celebrates the Light Region Light Show with edible fireworks, while Sneevil makes a volcano erupt with flowing lava, threatening all of the Smighties. Its up to the Super Six to use their powers and save the day.

programme.title: Fly me to the Moon.
programme.desc: When Gummy admires how pretty the moon is up in the sky, he decides he wants to go there, and sets out to try and do just that in some pretty strange ways!

programme.title: San Juan Night
programme.desc: To get some alone time with the beautiful Nora, Fred must jump through multiple hoops, including saving the town’s history book from a fire.

programme.title: Invincible Dragon - Saitn George’s Legend
programme.desc: SANDRA visits her UNCLE TONY at the old funfair where he works and is shocked to hear that it is about to shut down, because of falling visitor numbers. When she is on the ghost train, she is visited by her assistant FO, who has come to get her for a new case in the “Land of Fairytales”. On this occasion, SANDRA and FO travel into the legend of “Saint George and the Dragon”, where they face a very singular DRAGON.

programme.title: Shhh~ It`s a Secret
programme.desc: The gang is exploring the flowers, but Duda wants to explore something more exciting. He learns about Wibbly-Wobbly Cliff and becomes animated with interest. Unfortunately, Dada tells him not to go there alone because its dangerous. Despite Dadas warnings, Duda persuades Caber to go to the cliff with him. They discover a treasure in a cave but are afraid to upset Dada and promise to keep their find a secret from each other. Duda has a hard time keeping his secret and accidentally lets it slip to Piggy, Puggy and Bubble. Soon, everyone puts the pieces together and goes to find Duda and Caber. Meanwhile, Duda and Caber are in the treasure cave playing with their treasure. However, instead of having fun they seem a little sad...

programme.title: Captain Blackbeard – Little Mermaid Case 2
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the story of “The Little Mermaid” by Hans Christian Andersen, having been called out by a Turtle-Doctor, who is attending to NEPTUNE, the king of the seas. The LITTLE MERMAID, the monarch’s youngest daughter, has mysteriously disappeared. NEPTUNE is very sad and his health is in danger. SANDRA and FO will carry out an in-depth investigation, discovering that everything forms part of a plan by the SEA WITCH. The evil villain of the ocean depths has summoned up the perfidious monsters of the sea, in order to gain power over all the oceans.

programme.title: El amor de Violeta

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: Crowing Pains 1947
programme.desc: Foghorn convinces Henery that Sylvester is a chicken. Foghorn sticks Henery in an egg and sticks it under Sylvester.

programme.title: Space Transformer 1985
programme.desc: Using new technology, a crew consisting of Captain Chi, Nancy, and the robots Baipam and Diatron 5, is shrunken to microscopic size and injected into Ivy's body in order to defeat the invaders. Enlisting benevolent beings found inside Ivy's body, the crew prepares for an inner space battle that can decide the fate of the world.

programme.title: Ancient Fistory 1953
programme.desc: It's the middle ages (sort of); Popeye is working in Bluto's Beanery. Bluto is going to the ball where Princess Olive will choose her mate. Popeye's fairy godpappy appears and it's a reverse Cinderella story, with a car created from a can of spinach.

programme.title: A Car-Tune Portrait 1937
programme.desc: A symphony composer lion is determined to show the audience that cartoon characters can be more than just silly and childish by having cartoons play a symphony orchestra. Things quickly fall apart as the true nature of cartoons comes out anyways

programme.title: Boy Meets Dog 1938
programme.desc: A commercial short made for the Bristol-Myers Co. (plugging their toothpaste) that features the characters from the "Reg'lar Fellers" syndicated newspaper comic strip by Gene Byrnes. The plot concerns a boy who has an old grouch for a daddy, runs off, meets a dog and joins a gang of kids. Meanwhile,the old man has a nightmare,where he sees himself as an old sour puss because he doesn't take care of his teeth and gums. He sees an electric sign for Bristol-Myers toothpaste, and that sets him on a more positive course. (The few-seconds of film showing the sign represents the only commercial intrusion in this short)

programme.title: The Booze Hangs High-1930
programme.desc: Bosko has a grand time on the farm, dancing with a cow, playing a horse's tail like a violin and getting drunk with three pigs

programme.title: to duck or not to duck (1920x1080)
Betty Boop with Henry the Funniest Living American-1935
programme.desc: Henry, comic strip character, gets a job at Betty Boop's pet store

programme.title: Suddenly It's Spring 1944
programme.desc: In this longer cartoon, Raggedy Ann's little girl mistress is seriously ill and needs sunlight to recover. Raggedy Ann sets off on a mission to the sun and other elements to make Winter end early. works a minor miracle, with the help of the elements.

programme.title: A Haul in One 1956
programme.desc: Popeye and Bluto are, believe it or not, pals and partners in a moving company. (Maybe it's because Popeye isn't squinting here.) Anyhow, Olive has made the mistake of hiring them. She hasn't finished packing yet, so the boys, smitten as soon as she answers the door, compete to help her. Once packed, they compete to move more impressive piles of her belongings. Popeye easily wins these contests, even though Bluto locks him in the van at one point. At the end, Bluto socks Popeye into the piano, then into a table; though he hardly seems to need it, Popeye still eats his spinach, then thrashes Bluto.

programme.title: Raw! Raw! Rooster 1956
programme.desc: Foghorn's annoying college buddy, Rhode Island Red, comes for a visit and then won't leave. What's worse, he muscles in on Foggy's harem and reverses most of Foggy's traps and tricks. A football session with an exploding casaba melon backfires when Red returns the pass; the exploding golf balls only explode when Foghorn hits them, and the fist in the camera only pops out when Foggy examines it to figure out what went wrong. But Foghorn finally gets the last laugh with a phony telegram about an inheritance and an exploding bowling ball as a parting gift.

programme.title: Campus Capers 1949
programme.desc: This one features a cat-versus-mouse football game between two cat-and-mouse colleges, called Harbard and Quinceton, and there is nothing Ivy-League about either school. The highlights are a screwy college fight-song and a statute-of-liberty misdirection football play in which the Statute of Liberty participates.

programme.title: Rookie Revue 1941
programme.desc: The toons do a send up of the military as only the toons can do

programme.title: Tulips Shall Grow 1942
programme.desc: A carefree boy and a young girl find their idyllic countryside invaded by an army of mindlessly destructive robots.

programme.title: Land of the Lost Jewels 1950
programme.desc: Two children are fishing when they catch a talking fish named Red Lantern. He takes them underwater with him to the Land of the Lost, where missing items can be found again. They meet King Find All, a walrus, and a singing cricket (Hoppy-Go-Lucky) that used to be the girl's pin. He's deemed to be a special jewel (since he's made of emerald) and is brought to the jewel storage room, despite his wishes to be in the Land of the Toys. He runs away from Queen Tiara's guards, but is caught, and when they test him for authenticity they find he is only a fake diamond, after which he is allowed to live in the Land of the Toys after all. The children return to the surface and say goodbye to Red Lantern.

The Stolen Jools 1931
programme.desc: The boys and a Los Angeles police detective investigate the theft of actress Norma Shearer's jewelry.

programme.title: Kid Auto Races at Venice -1914
programme.desc: The Tramp wanders into and disrupts the filming of a go-kart race.

programme.title: School's Out 1930
programme.desc: The kids mistake Miss Crabtree's brother for a potential boyfriend, and plot to discourage him.

programme.title: Mabel, Fatty and the Law
programme.desc: In a small city park where strict vigilance is maintained against flirting. Mabel, a young and pretty wife with a bore of a husband innocently amuses herself with the harmless attentions of Fatty. Fatty relishes the situation all the more because this is one of those rare occasions, when he has succeeded in escaping from the jailer-like watchfulness of his wife. Meanwhile, Fatty's wife and Mabel's husband are carrying on a similar game. They are discovered by the police and a sensational arrest ensues. Both couples appear in court, where numerous complications make a reel full of fun.

programme.title: Here's Lucy 1974: Season 6; Episode 19; Milton Berle Is the Life of the Party
programme.desc: Chastized for her boring parties, Lucy wins a celebrity charity auction, enlisting Milton Berle as a guest for her next party.

programme.title: The Fatal Mallet-1914
programme.desc: Three man will fight for the love of a charming girl. Charlie will play dirty, throwing bricks to his contender, and using a huge hammer to hurt one of them. But a precocious kid will be the fourth suitor in discord.

programme.title: Young Sherlocks-1922
programme.desc: The Mystic J.J.J.'s challenge Ernie's bravery; he spins a tale of saving a rich young girl from kidnappers and of creating a utopia called Freetown.

programme.title: The Goat 1921
programme.desc: A series of adventures begins when an accident during photographing causes Buster to be mistaken for Dead Shot Dan, the local bad guy.

programme.title: The Dick Van Dyke Show 1962; Season 2; Episode 1; Never Name a Duck
programme.desc: Ritchie becomes very attached to two baby ducks that were left over from a show and adopts them. Rob faces the task of making Ritchie understand the consequence of trying to keep pets that may be happier living in the wild.

programme.title: His Girl Friday 1940
programme.desc: A newspaper editor uses every trick in the book to keep his ace reporter ex-wife from remarrying

Honor of the Range - 1934
programme.desc: After Sheriff Ken puts money in the safe, his brother Clem gives Rawhide the combination. With the money gone the disgruntled townsmen make Boots Sheriff and lock up Ken. Clem, now a prisoner of Rawhide, has a change of heart and sends Ken a message with the outlaw's location. Ken escapes by impersonating the saloon entertainer and rides for the hangout.

programme.title: Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans S1E30 False Faces

programme.title: Guns in the Dark 1937

programme.title: The Hard Hombre 1931
programme.desc: When Peaceful Patton goes to work at the Martini ranch he is mistaken for the notorious outlaw the Hard Hombre. This enables him to force the ranchers to divide up the water rights. But he is in trouble when his mother arrives and exposes the hoax.

programme.title: Pampita por Swarovski + New York Fashion Week + Educación en medicina estética | PROGRAMA COMPLETO
programme.desc:
Programa completo de #ChicasGuapasTV
- Cobertura del #newyorkfashionweek: Entrevista al diseñador argentino Panni Margot, el homenaje a #AgathaRuizDeLaPrada, experiencia TresEmmé y todo el backstage exclusivo. - Hablamos con Pampita en el relanzamiento de #Swarovski en Argentina. - Hablamos con Teresa Ortega y Mariano Retamal sobre la nueva plataforma educativa de medicina estética de @MedexxHighTechnology.

programme.title: LAFS 2024 Miami con Stef Roitman + Reducir la celulitis + Decoración de interior | PROGRAMA COMPLETO
programme.desc:
Programa completo de #ChicasGuapasTV del 16/11/24:
- Cobertura del @latinamericanfashionsummit: Lucía Ugarte entrevistó a #StefRoitman, #calleypoche, a Samantha (co-fundadora de #LAFS) y además, "La Torres" nos cuenta cómo va el desarollo de su negocio luego de haber ganado el premio de #ChicasGuapasFoundation. - Fuimos al lanzamiento oficial de #Alidya en Argentina y conocemos todos los detalles de su nuevo producto para la prevención y reducción de la #celulitis - En un nuevo episodio de #YoJefa, conocemos la historia de Lorena Sauer, quién emigró de Argentina en los años 2000 y hoy vive en #Miami triunfando con la #decoraciondeinteriores.

programme.title: Cali Distrito Moda + Ayurveda
programme.desc: Cali Distrito Moda + Ayurveda

programme.title: Ale Vigil Winemaker + Bodega Bonfati + Pasarela federal + Anabel Sanchez
programme.desc: Chicas Guapas is the first TV and online community of fashion, beauty and lifestyle with #EmbajadorasChicasGuapas. They are Latin American influencers in Argentina, Uruguay, Chile, Mexico, Colombia, Ecuador, Peru, Paraguay, Costa Rica, Venezuela and the UK. In Chicas Guapas, the audience can become a protagonist by voting weekly their favorite makeup and hair tutorials, contesting for tickets to exclusive events, meeting emerging designers & celebrities and exploring the trends of each season from the hand of our #EmbajadorasChicasGuapas . Chicas Guapas has more than 97 million monthly impressions. It was created and is directed by Lucía Ugarte, from Buenos Aires, Argentina.

programme.title: Argentinos en Miami + Warmichella + Back So Pink
programme.desc: Argentinos en Miami + Warmichella + Back So Pink

programme.title: NAOMI SCOTT: estreno de SMILE 2 + Desfile MARIAN SAUD + Yo Jefa | PROGRAMA COMPLETO
programme.desc:
Programa completo de #ChicasGuapasTV del 09/11/24:
- Entrevista exclusiva de Lucía Ugarte a #NaomiScott por el estreno de #Smile2. - Cobertura del desfile de Marian Saud: Rox habló con la diseñadora y con invitadas de lujo como Candela Ruggeri, #milettfigueroa, Sofía Macaggi, Stephanie Demner y Agustina Casanova. - Tráiler de "Cómo si fuéramos sólo amigos", la nueva comedia romántica de Sebastián Badilla y Manu Viale, con Lucía Ugarte como productora ejecutiva. - Lanzamiento de #Skin1004 en Argentina: hablamos con #pampita, Paula Chávez y @SimonScaranoDermatologo. - #YoJefa: la historia de Niki Baratt, la creadora de "Niki beauty bar".

programme.title: Ágatha Ruiz de la Prada + Anamá Ferreyra + Styling con Rocío Rivero + So pink | PROGRAMA COMPLETO
programme.desc:
Programa completo de #ChicasGuapasTV
- Cobertura de la exposición de #ÁgathaRuízDeLaPrada en el Centro Cultura Recoleta: charlamos con Ágatha, Anamá Ferreyra y Liliana Parodi y Cool hunting con Rox. - The Fashion Styling Experience con Lucía Ugarte luciendo diseños de Rocío Rivero. - Hablamos con Marcelo Arias de #SoPink, invitado especial en el #FashionWeek. - Tendencias en uñas con Pamela Conde de "Conde Nails".

programme.title: Among Us UFO Witnesses And Whistleblowers
Guest Shaun T
programme.desc: Shaun T is an amazing fitness trainer — the man behind Insanity — and he’s had a fascinating life. He goes deep into how he was sexually abused throughout his youth and how he’s become an inspiration to others and what you really should be doing to get the best workout you can.

programme.title: Guest Josh Johnson
programme.desc: Josh Johnson is back to talk about Luigi and the wild world we’re living in. Buckle up.

programme.title: Guest Brent Faiyaz
programme.desc: Brent Faiyaz just dropped his new album Larger than Life, so we’re throwing back to our last interview with him.

programme.title: Plant Pure Nation
programme.desc: The documentary that could save your life! Watch the documentary PlantPure Nation for FREE!

programme.title: Give Me Shelter - Film
programme.desc: Celebrities are on a mission to save animals caught in the crosshairs of human arrogance and greed.

programme.title: Eating Our Way To Extinction
programme.desc: Narrated by Kate Winslet, this film asks: Will our own species go extinct due to our own actions?

programme.title: A Life-Changing Weight Loss Talk
programme.desc: Drop Pounds the Delicious Way: Dr. Greger’s Ultimate Plant-Based Weight Loss Secrets!

programme.title: Cemetery Stories
programme.desc: On Halloween a couple, both of which are clairvoyants, drive to a cemetery. They go for fun to pick up vibrations from the tombstones of the deceased. As they pick up vibrations they have visions of how the person died. Each vibration and vision seems to get darker and darker. In the midst of all of this, they are being stalked by a dark shadowy figure. What starts out as some Halloween fun quickly turns to terror...

programme.title: Groupie
programme.desc: When a mysterious groupie joins legendary cursed band, "The Dark Knights", a series of unexplained murders derails their comeback tour...

programme.title: Rise of the Mummy
programme.desc: A group of archaeology students awaken an ancient mummy. After being trapped in a time loop, the only way they can escape, is to defeat the mummy. As the body count rises, it seems the Mummy has to collect the souls of those who woke him to be able to walk the earth - for good...

programme.title: Contención
programme.desc: ¿Qué ocurre cuando estalla una epidemia y no se sabe nada? Puede ocurrir cualquier cosa. Poco a poco, los residentes se dan cuenta de que todos morirán a menos que se unan...

programme.title: Poltergeist Americano
programme.desc: Horribles visiones atormentan a Taryn cuando ella, su hermano y sus compañeros de universidad se mudan a una vieja e infame casa. Entonces, sus sangrientas alucinaciones se vuelven demasiado reales...

programme.title: Isla de las Muñecas
programme.desc: Un grupo de personas va a la legendaria Isla de las Muñecas para conocer la verdad mortal...

programme.title: El Mal Interior
programme.desc: Un chico solitario y mentalmente discapacitado se hace amigo de su reflejo en un espejo antiguo. Esta criatura demoníaca le ordena que se lance a una matanza asesina de las personas que más quiere...

programme.title: El Equipo Del Diablo
programme.desc: En una ciudad que queda en la frontera de México y los Estados Unidos hay una batalla entre los narcos El 8 y el Z4 que controlan todo el territorio, pero hay un comando especial de mercenarios que trabajan para su propia cuenta se llaman "El Equipo del Diablo" y su líder es el malvado Diablo. Cuando el gobierno quiere parar lo que esta pasando mandan al agente Ortiz para poner orden, pero como siempre cuando se trata de sicarios, ejercito, y narco.. Solamente el pueblo sale dañado.

programme.title: El Mundo Es Tuyo 2
programme.desc: Esta es la continuación del MUNDO ES TUYO. Por fin sabremos que sucedió con los personajes de esta impactante historia.

programme.title: Dinero Maldito
programme.desc: En esta película les presento una historia muy triste donde un hombre pobre echa a perder su vida al encontrarse un dinero y hacerse rico. me acompañan el gran actor Sergio Reynoso y la guapísima Elizabeth Solís. No se la pierdan.

programme.title: Añoranzas de mi Madre
programme.desc: Ana, una mujer ambiciosa, arrogante y sin escrúpulos ha perdido el verdadero significado de la vida, de los sentimientos y de la Naturaleza misma. Al momento de fallecer su madre hace un viaje fantasioso a través de una regresión inesperada, donde su propia madre infante la guía, para conocer sus ancestros, sanar su pasado y por consecuencia su presente.

programme.title: Asalto al Cine
programme.desc: La policía toma por asalto un espacio donde grupos de jóvenes se reúnen, El Negus, el Chale, el Sapo y la Chata, logran escapar, viendo cerrarse las puertas del Faro detrás suyo. Cuatro jóvenes amigos, en una unidad habitacional de la colonia guerrero, se aburren esperando evadir sus conflictos personales. Un día como cualquier otro, deciden asaltar un cine, con la esperanza de encontrar en esto una salida a su monotonía; pero en cambio sólo encuentran acelerar su choque con la realidad y terminan por volver al mismo sitio: una banca de la unidad.

programme.title: Aerosol
programme.desc: El líder de una banda mexicana mata a un oponente en la guerra de pandillas en los 80's, por lo que huye a la ciudad de Los Ángeles, California. Dieciocho años después regresa al barrio sin un objetivo definido, sólo para encontrar a su hermano menor, involucrado en las pandillas de hoy. El crimen organizado utiliza niños para distribuir droga en los barrios. En combatir la corrupción y el crimen que hay en el barrio, Nuk encuentra un significado para su retorno y un camino para redimir las muertes que causó

programme.title: El Secreto Oculto
programme.desc: Describe los eventos del fin de los tiempos de la humanidad profetizada por místicos y Santos sobre los 3 días de oscuridad en que los demonios serán soldados ...

programme.title: Soy Una Buena Persona
programme.desc: Sabina es una treintañera muy "artista" convencida de que podrá algún día vivir de su arte como diseñadora, actriz, guionista o directora, porque ella está destinada a petarlo. Mientras, como casi toda su generación, malvive gorroneando en casa de sus padres. Pero una noche tiene, por desgracia ajena, una oportunidad de lujo... y no dudará en aprovecharla sin pensárselo demasiado.

programme.title: El Cóndor En Nueva York
programme.desc: Un narcotraficante de Nueva York, llamado Damián, ha creado una nueva droga con efectos impactantes. Después de varias muertes accidentales, la DEA y la policía se embarcan en una búsqueda inútil en busca de este jefe de la mafia. Damián comienza a derrotar a su competencia con la ayuda de su científico privado y un informante de la DEA. El hijo del alcalde Martínez (de Súper Cóndor) queda en coma tras consumir el nuevo medicamento. El alcalde Martínez vuela a Nueva York desde Perú para comenzar su propia investigación en busca de Damián y una cura. Todo parece sombrío para los agentes de la DEA, el alcalde Martínez y su hijo; hasta que llegue la ayuda. El Cóndor llega a Nueva York desde Perú para ayudar a revertir los efectos de esta nueva y brutal droga y llevar a Damián ante la justicia.

programme.title: New Number Same Name
programme.desc: If you’re looking at what’s next and feeling nervous, remember this: What God has done in your life is only the foundation, not the finish line. He’s a creative God, still at work in ways you’re not expecting. Let go of your plan so God can show you His purpose.

programme.title: I Still Love The Church
programme.desc: In “I Still Love The Church,” Pastor Tauren Wells teaches us that sometimes the purpose of our gifts is to solve the problems that we recognize.

programme.title: The Lord Will Lighten Your Load
programme.desc: When you’ve been hurt, it can be hard to keep hoping. But God wants to lift the weight you’ve been carrying today. Learn from the life of Israel (Jacob, Jacob), how God will give you a strategy to unburden your heart and move forward.

programme.title: When God Gets Ready
programme.desc: People label, but God names. You don’t have to chase identity or earn worth, because you’ve always been called, loved, and set apart for something more.

programme.title: When God Says Let Go
programme.desc: Is your faith being tested? If you’ve been waiting on the details of what God has next, remember that God doesn’t give a test without a lesson first, so if He’s calling you to let go of something, you can trust He’s already provided you with what you’ll need to take that step.
